package.name: System_Command
package.summary: PEAR::System_Command is a commandline execution interface.
package.description:
System_Command is a commandline execution interface.
Running functions from the commandline can be dangerous if the proper precautions are not taken to escape the shell arguments and reaping the exit status properly. This class give a formal interface to both, so that you can run a system command as comfortably as you would run a php function, which full pear error handling as results on failure.

release.notes:
This is the initial independent PEAR release.
There is a known bug that which() does not work on windows platforms and I am looking into options for solving this problem.
